name: Backyard Football
overview: #1 FOOTBALL VIDEO GAME FOR KIDS! All the hard-hitting action of a realistic simulation and wacky arcade game in one! - Authentic NFL strategies & teams - 15 Top NFL pros, 22 Backyard kids - Custom teams & players - Easy enough for rookies, challenging for all-stars - Single game & season modes - Power-ups & unlockables - THE ONLY GAME WITH NFL PROS AS KIDS!
